channel.title: Comments on: Marketing Your Business -We’ve Exposed 8 Proven Ways!!
channel.description: Web × Design; Branditechture is an hybrid creative design agency.

item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/8-proven-ways-to-market-your-business/#comment-448">mickreff</a>.
Yes. I did integrate Zapier with my Wave Invoice account. On Zapier, I created a Mailchimp + Wave integration to send new customer profiles (Full name and email) to a Mailchimp list.
Yep it would be nice if you could spare some time to write a comprehensive guide for other people to learn from. We'd be glad.
What invoicing system are you currently using?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to mickreff.

Yes. I did integrate Zapier with my Wave Invoice account. On Zapier, I created a Mailchimp + Wave integration to send new customer profiles (Full name and email) to a Mailchimp list.

Yep it would be nice if you could spare some time to write a comprehensive guide for other people to learn from. We’d be glad.

What invoicing system are you currently using?

item.title: By: mickreff
item.dc:creator: mickreff
item.description: Most digital invoicing systems come with integration tools. For example, you can integrate a tool called Zapier, to automatically sync the e-mails of your clients into your Mailchimp list each time you send an invoice to a new client. Their e-mails can be used to send them marketing campaigns. (Let me know in the comments if you want me to create a comprehensive guide on that) give a guide on this. nice work for this topic
item.content:encoded:
Most digital invoicing systems come with integration tools. For example, you can integrate a tool called Zapier, to automatically sync the e-mails of your clients into your Mailchimp list each time you send an invoice to a new client. Their e-mails can be used to send them marketing campaigns. (Let me know in the comments if you want me to create a comprehensive guide on that) 
give a guide on this.
nice work for this topic

item.title: By: Paul
item.dc:creator: Paul
item.content:encoded:
That’s an awesome article right there.
Thanks for this!

“Owning a website on the web is akin to owning a house in real life, and with a custom domain name, it is just like owning a street named after your business.”
﻿This paragraph got me. I’ll like to quote it on my next landing page. I’m definitely going to give credits.
﻿Let me know if you are OK with that.
Thanks for the writeup once more!
